  "scoringProfiles": [
    {
      "name": "MyProfile",
      "text": {
        "weights": {
          "description": 1.5,
          "category": 2.0
        }
      },
      "functions": [
        {
          "type": "magnitude",
          "magnitude": {
            "boostingRangeStart": 1.0,
            "boostingRangeEnd": 4.0,
            "constantBoostBeyondRange": true
          },
          "fieldName": "rating",
          "boost": 2.0,
          "interpolation": "constant"
        },
        {
          "type": "distance",
          "distance": {
            "referencePointParameter": "loc",
            "boostingDistance": 5.0
          },
          "fieldName": "location",
          "boost": 1.5,
          "interpolation": "linear"
        },
        {
          "type": "freshness",
          "freshness": {
            "boostingDuration": "P365D"
          },
          "fieldName": "lastRenovationDate",
          "boost": 1.1,
          "interpolation": "logarithmic"
        }
      ],
      "functionAggregation": "average"
    },
    {
      "name": "ProfileTwo",
      "functions": [
        {
          "type": "tag",
          "tag": {
            "tagsParameter": "mytags"
          },
          "fieldName": "tags",
          "boost": 1.5,
          "interpolation": "linear"
        }
      ],
      "functionAggregation": "maximum"
    },
    {
      "name": "ProfileThree",
      "functions": [
        {
          "type": "magnitude",
          "magnitude": {
            "boostingRangeStart": 0.0,
            "boostingRangeEnd": 10.0,
            "constantBoostBeyondRange": false
          },
          "fieldName": "rating",
          "boost": 3.0,
          "interpolation": "quadratic"
        }
      ],
      "functionAggregation": "minimum"
    },
    {
      "name": "ProfileFour",
      "functions": [
        {
          "type": "magnitude",
          "magnitude": {
            "boostingRangeStart": 1.0,
            "boostingRangeEnd": 5.0,
            "constantBoostBeyondRange": false
          },
          "fieldName": "rating",
          "boost": 3.14,
          "interpolation": "constant"
        }
      ],
      "functionAggregation": "firstMatching"
    }
  ],
  "defaultScoringProfile": "MyProfile",
  "corsOptions": {
    "allowedOrigins": [
      "http://tempuri.org",
      "http://localhost:80"
    ],
    "maxAgeInSeconds": 60
  },
  "suggesters": [
    {
      "name": "FancySuggester",
      "sourceFields": [
        "hotelName"
      ],
      "searchMode": "analyzingInfixMatching"
    }
  ],
  "analyzers": [
    {
      "@odata.type": "#Microsoft.Azure.Search.StopAnalyzer",
      "name": "a1"
    },
    {
      "@odata.type": "#Microsoft.Azure.Search.StopAnalyzer",
      "name": "a2"
    }
  ]
}
